name: Boop
description: `THE LORE OF THE BOTZ The year is not yet known but the botz are ready for battle. Humans are no longer able to survive on this planet and we the botz fight to gain control of the master AI to rule for centuries to come. You, the player, embark on this journey as a Beep Boop Bot! A rowdy little fella who wants to rule the world and comes in 5 different varieties of skills & abilities. You can collect more bots, upgrade your bots & earn $BOOP all to be the last bot standing... When the time is right, stake your bots in the battle holding zone to yield your daily $BOOP but be warned... time is against you.
